name: Building City Simualation
description:
Feel like a professional builder on duty with this 3D construction simulator. Complete various missions sitting behind the steering wheel of heavy construction vehicles –feel like a crane operator or drive a demolition machine crashing old houses

Features:
- Various heavy vehicles to drive – construction trucks, bulldozers, cranes, excavators, forklifts and even more
- Driving, parking, transporting and building missions
- Amazing 3D graphics
- All the stages of city building – from a construction plan to demolition of old building
- Realistic construction site for you to explore
